songs.title: It Is What It Is
songs.lyrics:
[x16](Hopsin)

[Verse 1: Hopsin]
I'm a radical nuisance, and I'm back on my bullshit
Went from lashing on ruthless to hanging rappers from nooses
You ain't gotta like me, but like a magnet and you stick
Breaking these niggas was easy like snapping a toothpick
Your whole gimmick's a fraud, you just casting illusions
That's how niggas get ran up on and cracked with a broomstick
Watch what my promo does to your whole buzz, you're dead
I don't show no love to homo thugs
My haters never show they face, they usually try to hide, but when they see me at my shows, I'm who they truly idolize. (I LOVE YOU!) I keep a handful of ugly groupies I deny, knowing if they ever showed up at my crib by surprise. (What the fuck?)

[Verse 2: Jaylenz]
Niggas gonna recognize, we the coldest niggas [?] shit
[Adlib:Hopsin](Huh?)
I been off for a minute, now I'm back in this bitch. I'm going off [?], bitch I been ripping this
[Adlib:Hopsin](What?)
Any minute and I'm with it, come and get it cause I been killing it
[Adlib:Hopsin](Uh-huh)
[Adlib:Hopsin](Get it)
[Adlib:Hopsin](Oh)

[x3](It is what it is)

(I been up on this, I'm a motherfucking selfish cat. Quick to walk on niggas like a welcome mat. Wassup?)

[x2](It is what it is)

(So bitch suck a dick, the kids busting sick. I'm a motherfucking selfish cat, quick to walk on niggas like a welcome mat. Wassup?)

[Verse 3: Jaylenz]
Yo, it is what it is, [?] for the kids
Break into your crib and stick a fucking pen through your rib
I'll get you pinned to the fridge as I empty this clip into the cat and dog, and get to fucking busting like I'm jacking off
I laugh it off when it comes to the thought of death and shit
Got the angel and devil on my shoulder steady wrestlin'
Check inside your mom, you'll most likely find my specimen
My jizz will paint her face whiter than the forty second president
Quietly evident, popping medicine just to get me off
[?] and bungee jump with some dental floss
Hit from the back so hard, you see my penis is her jaws
Go deeper and give birth to myself while she in menopause
It's probably my potty mouth that got you mad, cause I'm a motherfucking grouch hopping in trash, and smoke [?]'s ass
My dick's harder than jerking off with a doctor's cost, shot his ass, then hide in the same spot that 2Pac is at

[x4](It is what it is)
(I been up on this, I'm a motherfucking selfish cat. Quick to walk on niggas like a welcome mat. Wassup?)

[x2](It is what it is)
(So bitch suck a dick, I been up on this. The kid's busting sick. I'm a motherfucking selfish cat. Quick to walk on niggas like a welcome mat. Wassup?)

[x8](Suck a dick)

(Hopsin)
